version_description:
Bench Programs!! Oh yeah. These are going to take your bench up to another level. There are FOUR ALL NEW programs in this app version.

1) 3-day bench program
2) Small Load Bench Program (4-day)
3) Medium Load Bench Program (4-day)
4) Large Load Bench Program (4-day)

All programs are 16 weeks long and are available separately as in-app purchases for an extremely reasonable price compared to what you would pay the man himself for these. And yes, they are exclusive programs you can not find anywhere else.

Lift more brothers.

Bench Programs!! Oh yeah. These are going to take your bench up to another level. There are FOUR ALL NEW programs in this app version.

1) 3-day bench program
2) Small Load Bench Program (4-day)
3) Medium Load Bench Program (4-day)
4) Large Load Bench Program (4-day)

All programs are 16 weeks long and are available separately as in-app purchases for an extremely reasonable price compared to what you would pay the man himself for these. And yes, they are exclusive programs you can not find anywhere else.

Lift more brothers.

Autoregulation comes to Sheiko with Reps in Reserve (RIR)

How hard should your sets be? Now in addition to logging your weights x reps, you can also log how close your set was to failure. With guidance from Sheiko provided in the app, you can adjust your weight as needed to achieve the desired training effect.

Autoregulation comes to Sheiko with Reps in Reserve (RIR)

How hard should your sets be? Now in addition to logging your weights x reps, you can also log how close your set was to failure. With guidance from Sheiko provided in the app, you can adjust your weight as needed to achieve the desired training effect.

Quick bug fixes
*Entered reps in a workout were off by one.
*Cycle summary number of lifts greater than 999 showed as 1 or 2.

That's it guys. If you have any issues, send an email through the app and report it. Anything that pops up will be promptly fixed. If you like the app consider giving it a rating. It only takes a minute and is much appreciated. -Robert

Quick bug fixes
*Entered reps in a workout were off by one.
*Cycle summary number of lifts greater than 999 showed as 1 or 2.

That's it guys. If you have any issues, send an email through the app and report it. Anything that pops up will be promptly fixed. If you like the app consider giving it a rating. It only takes a minute and is much appreciated. -Robert

Bug Fixes
*A few issues on startup have been fixed
*Cycle resetting to Week 1 / Day 1 after the first week has been fixed
*Please send an email through the app to report any other issues you have or requestsBug Fixes

Fixed a small issue with adding additional preplanned exercises where you could not exit from the editing mode.
Fixed a small issue with adding additional preplanned exercises where you could not exit from the editing mode.
New profile section and easier access to the features you need.
New profile section and easier access to the features you need.

Fixed
*iPad users can't start the app
*Crashes on startup for a small number of people

Fixed
*iPad users can't start the app
*Crashes on startup for a small number of people
Watch App! Leave your phone in the locker and focus on training.
Watch App! Leave your phone in the locker and focus on training.

New
* Added body weight to data exported to the Health app. Check your permissions to enable it.
* Updated bar tracking coming soon...

Fixed
* Crash on startup for 1 user. Hey, if you're reading this send me an email if this doesn't fix your issue. I just had to guess since you didn't email me and give me details about the crash. sheikoforum@gmail.com

This version fixes an issue with weights and the 38mm Apple watch. There is also a change during workouts when logging RIR. When you set a value for that, the app will interpret the set as finished and mark it in red.

This version fixes an issue with weights and the 38mm Apple watch. There is also a change during workouts when logging RIR. When you set a value for that, the app will interpret the set as finished and mark it in red.

> Fixed a bug causing crashes after deleting an exercise
> Added support for iOS 13

> Fixed a bug causing crashes after deleting an exercise
> Added support for iOS 13
